page.title: 09Occupations in Alsager
page.content: There are two main industries in Alsager.They are Twyfords and Radway Green-the ammunitions factory.Both of these companies employ a large number of people.Alsager developed because it was convenient for the Potteries and Crewe.This helped the population to grow.A survey carried out in Alsager Comprehensive School showed that pupils parents worked in the Potteries,Crewe and Alsager.The type of employment showed a majority of manual workers with office workers a close second and self employed third.Most people worked in Alsager-201-,second came the people who worked in the Potteries-198-and lastly those who worked in Crewe-95.Of the pupils interviewed about 8% of pupils parents worked abroad on occasions.
